name: Fantastic seaview with ferry and tram also go to a famous temple's  tour
description:
Grab
a seat next to a window on the upper deck for the best views in a tram. And go to the famous temple,
its giant hanging incense coils makes for a pleasant contrast with the hectic
pace of the nearby financial district. 

Also enjoy your good experience to have
a sightseeing in our Victoria harbor by the
Star Ferry
starts from 1880,  The ferry ride is also well known as one of the 
world’s best
value-for-money sightseeing trips especially allow you to have a view on
 the fantastic sunset with your lovers, family or best friends.  It must
 a gorgeous experience for you!
